Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerInterface
public class Controller extends Object implements ControllerInterface
Controller of a single game. Its purpose is to schedule the turns, manage request from clients and appropriately send updates to clients. Some methods synchronize on this.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(int numberPlayers, int numberCommonGoalCards, int id)
      Constructor for this class. It creates a Controller for a not yet started (and constructed) game.
      Parameters:
      numberPlayers - - the number of players that need to join the game to make it start.
      numberCommonGoalCards - - the number of common goal cards of the game.
      id - The id assigned to the Game controlled.

  • Method Details

    • join

      public void join(ServerUpdateViewInterface view)
      Joins a ServerUpdateViewInterface into the match. If the join is rejected, the client will be notified. It synchronizes on this.
      Specified by:
      join in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      view - The ServerUpdateViewInterface performing the action.

    • livingRoom

      public void livingRoom(List<Position> positions, ServerUpdateViewInterface view)
      Performs a selection from the LivingRoom. If the selection is rejected, the client will be notified. It synchronizes on this.
      Specified by:
      livingRoom in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      positions - List of Positions that are chosen by the player.
      view - The ServerUpdateViewInterface performing the action.

    • bookshelf

      public void bookshelf(int column, List<Integer> permutation, ServerUpdateViewInterface view)
      Performs an insertion in the player's Bookshelf. If the insertion is rejected, the client will be notified. It synchronizes on this.
      Specified by:
      bookshelf in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      column - The column of the Bookshelf where to insert the previously chosen Items
      permutation - List of Integers representing the order in which to insert the Items in the Bookshelf.
      view - The ServerUpdateViewInterface performing the action.

    • chat

      public void chat(String text, String receiver, ServerUpdateViewInterface view)
      Processes a chat message from a player. If the message is rejected, the client will be notified. It synchronizes on this.
      Specified by:
      chat in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      text - The content of the message.
      receiver - The receiver of the message.
      view - The ServerUpdateViewInterface performing the action.

    • disconnection

      public void disconnection(ServerUpdateViewInterface view)
      Processes a disconnection of a client. It synchronizes on this.
      Specified by:
      disconnection in interface ControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      view - The ServerUpdateViewInterface that disconnected.

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Returns whether the game has started. It synchronizes on this.
      Specified by:
      isStarted in interface ControllerInterface
      Returns:
      true iff the game has already started.
